00001 import copy
00002 import standard

00004 class Nsga_ii(standard.Standard):
00005     def __init__(self, paramClass, paramDict):
00006         standard.Standard.__init__(self, paramClass, paramDict)

00008 #---------------------------------------#
00009     def crowdedDistance(self, fronts):
00010         '''
00011         Compute the crowding distance of individuals
00012         based on which front they're located.
00013         '''
00014         objmax, objmin = self.params.app.paramSpace(self.popsize, self.user_selected)
00015         objmax.append(1.0)
00016         objmin.append(0.0)
00017 
00018         numFronts = len(fronts)
00019         for i in xrange(numFronts):
00020 
00021             # for each criteria
00022             for k in xrange(len(objmax)):
00023             
00024                 extFitness = [fronts[i][j].fitness[k] for j in xrange(len(fronts[i]))]
00025                     
00026                 best_index = extFitness.index(min(extFitness))
00027                 worst_index = extFitness.index(max(extFitness))
00028 
00029                 for j in xrange(len(fronts[i])):
00030                     crowded_dist = 0.0
00031                     if j == best_index or j == worst_index:
00032                         crowded_dist = 1.0e3000
00033                     else:
00034                         crowfit = []
00035                         for l in xrange(len(fronts[i])):
00036                             crowfit.append(extFitness[j] - extFitness[l])
00037                         sortedcrowfit = copy.deepcopy(crowfit)
00038                         sortedcrowfit.sort()
00039                         zero_index = sortedcrowfit.index(0)
00040                         
00041                         more_index = crowfit.index(sortedcrowfit[zero_index-1])
00042                         less_index = crowfit.index(sortedcrowfit[zero_index+1])
00043 
00044                         crowded_dist = (float(extFitness[more_index] - extFitness[less_index])/float(objmax[k] - objmin[k]))
00045 
00046                     fronts[i][j].crowded_distance += crowded_dist
00047 
00048 #---------------------------------------#
00049     def domination(self, a, b):
00050         '''
00051         Determine if either a or b dominates the other.
00052         '''
00053         compare = []
00054         criteria = len(a)
00055 
00056         for i in xrange(criteria):
00057             if a[i] < b[i]:
00058                 compare.append(1)
00059             elif a[i] == b[i]:
00060                 compare.append(0)
00061             else:
00062                 compare.append(-1)
00063 
00064         if max(compare) > 0 and min(compare) >= 0:
00065             compareCt = 1
00066         elif max(compare) <= 0 and min(compare) < 0:
00067             compareCt = 2
00068         else:
00069             compareCt = 0
00070 
00071         return compareCt
00072     
00073 #---------------------------------------#
00074     def createFronts(self, pop):
00075         '''
00076         Create non-dominated fronts from evaluated population.
00077         '''
00078         # create fronts
00079         fit = [ind.fitness for ind in pop]
00080         serial = range(len(pop))
00081 
00082         nonDomFronts = []
00083         while (len(fit) > 0):
00084             nonDomPop = [0]
00085             i = 1
00086             flag = 0
00087             while (i < len(fit)):
00088                 domCt = []
00089                 nonDomCt = 0
00090                 flag = 0
00091                 for k in xrange(len(nonDomPop)):
00092                     compareCount = self.domination(fit[i], fit[nonDomPop[k]])
00093                     if compareCount == 1:
00094                         #i dominates
00095                         domCt.append(k)
00096                     elif compareCount == 2:
00097                         #i is dominated
00098                         i += 1
00099                         flag = 1
00100                         break
00101                     else:
00102                         #no domination
00103                         nonDomCt += 1
00104 
00105                 if flag == 0:
00106                     if nonDomCt == k+1:
00107                         nonDomPop.append(i)
00108                     if len(domCt) > 0:
00109                         for k in xrange(len(domCt)):
00110                             domCt[k] = domCt[k] - k
00111                         for k in xrange(len(domCt)):
00112                             del nonDomPop[domCt[k]]
00113 
00114                         nonDomPop.append(i)
00115                     i += 1
00116 
00117             nonDomPop.sort()
00118             front = []
00119             for k in xrange(len(nonDomPop)):
00120                 del fit[nonDomPop[k]-k]
00121                 ind_index = serial[nonDomPop[k]]
00122                 pop[ind_index].crowded_distance = 0.
00123                 pop[ind_index].rank = len(nonDomFronts)+1
00124                 front.append(pop[ind_index])
00125 
00126             nonDomFronts.append(front)
00127             for k in xrange(len(nonDomPop)):
00128                 del serial[nonDomPop[k]-k]
00129 
00130         return nonDomFronts
00131

00133     def fitnessBias(self, pop):
00134         for ind in pop:
00135             bias = ind.bloodline
00136             ind.fitness.append(bias)
00137

00139 #---------------------------------------#
00140     def nextgen(self):
00141         '''
00142         Create next generation from current population.
00143         '''
00144         newPop = []
00145         fronts = self.createFronts(self.pop)
00146         self.crowdedDistance(fronts)
00147 
00148         for i in xrange(0, self.popsize, 2):
00149             p1 = self.selectfunc(fronts, self.params.random)
00150             p2 = self.selectfunc(fronts, self.params.random)
00151             c1, c2 = self.crossover(p1, p2)
00152             self.params.mutate(c1)
00153             self.params.mutate(c2)
00154             newPop.extend([c1,c2])
00155 
00156         # evaluate children
00157         self.eval(newPop)
00158         # combine parents and children
00159         r = copy.deepcopy(self.pop)
00160         r.extend(newPop)
00161         new_fronts = self.createFronts(r)
00162         self.crowdedDistance(new_fronts)
00163         self.combinepop(new_fronts)
